resources.string:
Updates in this release:
 
 Version 0.8.1 Alpha
 • Fixed potential crash when downloading summit data
 • Ensure latest GPX track data is downloaded
 • Allow the map type to be selected for normal, satellite, and terrain
 
 Version 0.8 Alpha
 • Map view for uploaded GPX tracks to a summit
 • Added geo: link integration with Google Maps, Google Earth, and Gaia GPS
 
 Version 0.7.2 Alpha
 • A quick summary of summit data is now loaded first while the full CSV file is downloaded
 • Fixed issue with multiple downloads happening in parallel
 
 Version 0.7.1 Alpha
 • Fixed issues with API not reloading data correctly
 
 Version 0.7 Alpha
 • Changed summit list to multi-level list
 • Present many more details on the association and region being viewed
 • Added filter field to narrow down the association/region/summit
 • Updated launcher icon
 • Fixed some possible crashes
 
 Version 0.6 Alpha
 • Fixed possible crash when changing tabs
 • Automatically downloads latest summit data
 • SOTA region colorized on map
 • Markers are now colorized by point scale
 • Markers show summit name
 • Older Android phones are now supported
 • Fixed spinners layout and include assocation/region names
 
 Version 0.5 Alpha
 • Added a details view of each summit with a map for it
 • Optionally, show distance to summit from current location
 • Include links to SOTA and SOTLAS websites for a summit
 
 Version 0.4 Alpha
 • Added screen for showing detailed summit info
 
 Version 0.3 Alpha
 • Added opt-in analytics and crash reporting
 • Added feedback button
 • Added settings screen
 • Speed up first load of app
 
 Version 0.2 Alpha
 • Prevent user interface from hanging while loading data
 • Preserve last location when returning to app
 
 Version 0.1 Alpha
 • First demo release of SOTA Summit Mapping
